metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1049 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Pacemaker configuration tool (pcs). The pcs daemon was allowing expired accounts, and accounts with expired passwords to login when using PAM authentication. Therefore, unprivileged expired accounts that have been denied access could still login.

criterions.comment: pcs package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
